scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ~/Documents/FullStackMOOC/part2/phonebook && npm run build && cp -r build ~/Documents/FullStackMOOC/part3/phonebook-backend && cd ~/Documents/FullStackMOOC/part3/phonebook-backend
